SEARCH
Package photos.group4.model

Class UserList

java.lang.Object
photos.group4.model.UserList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserList extends Object implements Serializable
Class to store list of Users maintained by Photo Application. Only the special Admin User can modify Main source of Serialization of Photo Application User data Utilizes Singleton Design Pattern
See Also:
